name: Golden Gate Hotel
address: 123 Golden Gate Avenue, San Francisco, CA 94102
proximityToAttractions: Located just a 5-minute walk from the Golden Gate Bridge
neighborhoodSafety: Located in a safe and secure neighborhood
accessibility: Accessible to public transportation and major highways
wifi: Free WiFi available throughout the hotel
poolAndSpa: No pool or spa facilities available
climateControl: Individually controlled air conditioning and heating in all rooms
recentReview: The Golden Gate Hotel is a charming boutique hotel with a great location near the Golden Gate Bridge. The staff were friendly and helpful, and the rooms were clean and comfortable.
restaurant: No restaurant on-site, but various dining options nearby
petPolicy: Pet-friendly hotel, pets allowed with additional fee
parking: Limited on-site parking available for an additional fee
businessAmenities: Business center with printing and copying services
viewAndSurroundings: Some rooms offer views of the Golden Gate Bridge
